tachyon.worker.block.io

Class LocalFileBlockReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.block.io.LocalFileBlockReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, BlockReader

    public final class LocalFileBlockReader
extends Object
implements BlockReader
    This class provides read access to a block data file locally stored in managed storage.

    This class does not provide thread-safety. Corresponding lock must be acquired.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      LocalFileBlockReader(BlockMeta blockMeta)
      Constructs a Block reader given the metadata of this block.
      LocalFileBlockReader(String path)
      Constructs a Block reader given the file path of the block.
